lines.text: So what's the form then? Do I pay you now?
You don't carry that sort of cash around, do you?
What sort of cash are we talking about?
Well, how much do you think it's worth?
Okay, a hundred. A hundred thousand is about right.
A hundred thousand? No, no. I was talking about Pounds.
Well, so am I. A hundred thousand Pounds.
You deaf as well as debauched? Watch my mouth. One hundred thousand Pounds.

[incredulous]
A hundred thousand Pounds for a bit of rumpy bumpy?
